org.helepr

Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.java_websocket.WebSocketAdapter
      • org.java_websocket.server.WebSocketServer
        • org.helepr.ChatServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, WebSocketListener

    public class ChatServer
extends WebSocketServer
    A simple WebSocketServer implementation. Keeps track of a "chatroom".

      • onError

        public void onError(WebSocket conn,
           java.lang.Exception ex)
        Description copied from class: WebSocketServer
        Called when errors occurs. If an error causes the websocket connection to fail WebSocketServer.onClose(WebSocket, int, String, boolean) will be called additionally.
        This method will be called primarily because of IO or protocol errors.
        If the given exception is an RuntimeException that probably means that you encountered a bug.
        Specified by:
        onError in class WebSocketServer

      • sendToAll

        public void sendToAll(java.lang.String text)
        Sends text to all currently connected WebSocket clients.
        Parameters:
        text - The String to send across the network.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - When socket related I/O errors occur.
